name: EU VAT Reports for Woocommerce
author: Simple Intelligent Systems

sections.description:
EU VAT Reports for Woocommerce is used to generate VAT report for the European countries based on the country and date range filter. You can also download the CSV report after the filter has been applied. The plugin also shows the order amount based on the order listed on the current page.

The plugin is simple to set up and use. Once added and enabled it adds a menu item to the left menu section on the wordpress dashboard by the name of “EU Country Orders” above woocommerce.

Updating

Automatic updates will be available for the plugin as we add new features and resolve issues that are discovered; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.
sections.changelog:
1.1.2

Minor update for compatibility

1.1.1

Minor update for compatibility

1.1

  • Improved look of admin UI.
  • Latest WooCommerce versions supported.
  • Tweak – Added Invoice #, Gross Amount, Net Amount, VAT Percentage and VAT Amount.

1.0

  • New plugin launched

short_description: Easily generate VAT reports required by the European countries on the basis of country filter.  You can download the report in CSV format too.
